objects.text:
Premium Gold-Plated Curved Design
Double Row of Pearl Embellishments
Perfect for Casual and Formal Wear
Lightweight and Comfortable

product_details.name: Elegant Pearl & Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Luxury Statement Piece
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated curved design for sophisticated style
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Modern wave silhouette perfect for both casual and formal wear
• Secure post-back closure for comfortable all-day wear
• Versatile half-hoop design measures approximately 1 inch in length
• High-quality craftsmanship with smooth, polished finish
• Timeless combination of pearls and gold-tone metal
• Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear
• Perfect accessory for weddings, special occasions, or everyday elegance
• Comes as a matching pair with mirror-finish reflection

banner_details:
This banner features a sophisticated and elegant jewelry advertisement with a balanced composition and premium aesthetic. It includes a prominent main title ("heading") in a bold serif typeface that reinforces luxury, followed by a highlighted subheading ("subheading") in refined uppercase lettering. The informational content ("description") provides key product features in a clean, left-aligned format, aiding easy readability. The featured product image ("product_image") is centrally placed, showcasing reflective gold and pearl earrings. Supporting elements include a price indicator ("price") and prominent call-to-action button ("cta") with a contrasting background ("cta_background"). The decorative gold-lined frame and wave patterns in the background introduce a sense of elegance and movement.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm White (#F8F3EA)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- Rich Mustard (#A67C00)
- Pale Gold (#C9A227)
- Deep Olive Brown (#6B5824)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant gold-toned earrings accented with pearl detailing. The dominant color is a rich metallic gold (#D4AF37), which gives a premium and luxurious feel. This gold transitions smoothly with natural light reflections, creating highlights and shadows that enhance the curves and contours of the earrings. The pearls, in a soft ivory white (#F8F8FF), are symmetrically aligned and provide a sophisticated contrast, adding texture and grace. A subtle silver hue (#C0C0C0) is visible in the pin, balancing the entire palette. For an advertisement banner, a palette using gold, ivory, soft beige (#F5F5DC), and muted charcoal (#2E2E2E) will be effective in highlighting the elegance and premium appeal of the product.
